com.eco.bio7.collection

Class Work

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eco.bio7.collection.Work

  • public class Work
extends java.lang.Object
    This class offers some methods for the control of the views, perspectives and the editor area of the Bio7 application.
    Author:
    Bio7
